Description.Text: If you have dinner, please kindly be sure that the guests are requested to check in by 6 pm.

Hanabishi Hotel is an 8min walk from JR Beppu Station, 3min walk from Beppu Kitahama Bus stop by Limousine Bus from Oita Airport. Beppu "JIGOKU MEGURI" THE HELL TOUR, "Umitamago" Aquarium and African Safari Park are all within 30min drive and is the perfect base for leisure travelers.
The 143 guest rooms, facing Beppu Bay and overlooking a panoramic view of yacht harbor and Mt. Takasaki are equipped with A/C, Safety box, Telephone, Coffee/tea facilities and Hairdryer.
